biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

James Allen Whitmore III (born October 24, 1948), better known as James Whitmore, Jr., is an American actor best known for his role as Captain Jim Gutterman on the television program Baa Baa Black Sheep (later known as Black Sheep Squadron), and (since the 1980s) a television director. He is the son of actor James Whitmore.
name: James Whitmore Jr.
place_of_birth: New York City - New York - USA
